item.title: Readme
item.description: My name is Chance Jiajie Li (zh:李嘉杰), and I go by Chance. I am currently an graduate student at the City Science (formerly Changing Places) group at the MIT Media Lab. As a developer and researcher, my overarching goal is to enhance urban systems from a media technological perspective. Email: jiajie@mit.edu Github: github.com/LeeJAJA LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/chanceli Please feel free to send me an email if you are interested in collaborating or simply having a chat about science!
